ground_truth: Bob wanders in, squinting at the sudden presence of light, as headlights appear on the highway. Kyle stares at Audrey's beautiful, determined face and then pulls out his silver 45. The headlights become a family minivan careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps, and Kyle and Audrey aim their weapons at the vehicle. A well-dressed man in his mid-thirties jumps out of the car, looking around nervously, and after seeing the coast is clear, he offers a calming wave to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car. He races around to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey spin to look out over the back side of the diner, seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast. Kyle looks urgently back at the family as the father lifts the pump, and Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically at the family. Kyle fires his gun in the air, and at the sound of gunfire, the man looks quickly up to the roof, and his family starts to scream to him. The man can only see silhouettes in the light, but he doesn't wait to see if they are friend or foe. Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner. The father dashes to the driver's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at him, and his blood paints the car windows. Kyle raises his MP5 to fire upon the dark shapes that surround the vehicle like swarming insects. The possessed move in from all sides, but Kyle is remarkably agile, dropping them one after another. He closes in on the family, blasting back the creatures huddled around them, and finds the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face. Kyle swoops down, gathers the boy into his arms, and moves on to the mother. The creatures have stopped coming at him; instead, they're just standing there watching him. Kyle freezes, sensing something terribly wrong. Audrey raises the 45 and pulls the trigger, but it clicks. She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears stop instantly. Audrey backs away and looks toward the entrance to the diner, blocked by advancing creatures. They're everywhere, and she's trapped. She notices the open door to the minivan, dives into the car, and as the creatures rapidly close in, she hammers the auto door lock. Clunk! She moves to the center of the car as gruesome faces press against the windows, a nightmare come to life. Charlie rushes to Michael's side, but he's immovable. Charlie cocks the gun, moves toward the door, and looks back at him defiantly.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Bob roams in, peering at the abrupt occurrence of illumination, as headlights emerge on the roadway. Kyle gazes at Audrey's gorgeous, resolute visage and then extracts his argent .45. The headlights transform into a family van skidding wildly off the road to halt at the stations, and Kyle and Audrey direct their arms at the automobile. A finely-dressed gentleman in his mid-thirties leaps out of the car, glancing around apprehensively, and after perceiving the coast is unobstructed, he gives a pacifying wave to his spouse and young lad who await nervously inside the car. He dashes around to the fuel dispenser as Kyle and Audrey swivel to glance out over the posterior side of the eatery, observing a legion of murky forms swarming in fast. Kyle peers urgently back at the family as the father hoists the pump, and Kyle and Audrey signal their limbs desperately at the family. Kyle discharges his firearm into the sky, and at the noise of gunshot, the man glances quickly up to the roof, and his family commences to yell to him. The man can only observe outlines in the light, but he doesn't pause to discern if they are ally or adversary. Audrey observes in terror as the dark forms reach the diner. The father bolts to the driver's flank but notices a blur of motion rushing at him, and his blood stains the car panes. Kyle elevates his MP5 to discharge upon the dark shapes that encircle the vehicle like swarming vermin. The possessed advance in from all directions, but Kyle is remarkably nimble, dropping them one after another. He closes in on the family, blasting back the entities clustered around them, and discovers the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his visage. Kyle swoops down, gathers the boy into his limbs, and proceeds on to the mother. The beings have ceased approaching him; instead, they're merely standing there observing him. Kyle halts, sensing something dreadfully amiss. Audrey elevates the .45 and pulls the trigger, but it clicks. She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears cease instantaneously. Audrey retreats and peers toward the entry to the diner, obstructed by advancing entities. They're everywhere, and she's ensnared. She notices the open doorway to the van, dives into the car, and as the entities swiftly close in, she slams the auto door lock. Clunk! She moves to the center of the car as grotesque visages press against the panes, a nightmare materialized. Charlie dashes to Michael's flank, but he's immovable. Charlie cocks the weapon, moves toward the door, and glances back at him defiantly.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: Bob wanders in, squinting at the sudden presence of light, as headlights are appeared on the highway. Audrey's beautiful, determined face is stared at by Kyle and then his silver 45 is pulled out by him. A family minivan is careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps, and the vehicle is aimed at by Kyle and Audrey with their weapons. A well-dressed man in his mid-thirties jumps out of the car, looking around nervously, and after the coast is seen as clear by him, a calming wave is offered to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car. He races around to the gas pump as the back side of the diner is spun to be looked out over by Kyle and Audrey, seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast. The family is looked at urgently by Kyle as the pump is lifted by the father, and frantic waves are given to the family by Kyle and Audrey. Kyle fires his gun in the air, and at the sound of gunfire, the roof is quickly looked up to by the man, and screams to him are started by his family. Silhouettes can only be seen by the man in the light, but seeing if they are friend or foe isn't waited for by him. Dark shapes are watched in horror by Audrey as they reach the diner. The driver's side is dashed to by the father, but a blur of movement rushing at him is seen, and the car windows are painted with his blood. Kyle raises his MP5 to fire upon the vehicle-surrounding dark shapes that swarm like insects. The possessed move in from all sides, but remarkable agility is shown by Kyle, dropping them one after another. The family is closed in on by him, creatures huddled around them are blasted back, and the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face is found. The boy is swooped down upon and gathered into his arms by Kyle, who then moves on to the mother. The creatures have stopped coming at him; instead, they are just standing there watching him. Something terribly wrong is sensed by Kyle, who freezes. The 45 is raised by Audrey and the trigger is pulled, but a click is heard. The trigger is continued to be pulled by her as the boy's tears stop instantly. Audrey backs away and notices the entrance to the diner, blocked by creatures advancing. They're everywhere, and she's trapped. The open door to the minivan is noticed by her, she dives into the car, and as the creatures rapidly close in, the auto door lock is hammered by her. Clunk! The center of the car is moved to by her as gruesome faces press against the windows, a nightmare come to life. Michael's side is rushed to by Charlie, but he is immovable. The gun is cocked by Charlie, the door is moved toward, and a defiant look is cast back at him.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Bob squints at the sudden light as headlights appear on the highway. Kyle stares at Audrey's determined face and draws his silver 45. A family minivan careens wildly off the highway to the pumps, prompting Kyle and Audrey to aim their weapons. A well-dressed man jumps out, nervously assesses the coast, and waves to his wife and son waiting in the car. He rushes to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey urgently wave their arms. Kyle fires a warning shot, causing the man to glance up while his family screams. The man sees silhouettes and doesn't wait to discern their intent. Audrey watches in horror as dark shapes reach the diner. The father dashes to the driverâ€™s side, but a blur overtakes him, and his blood stains the windows. Kyle raises his MP5, firing at the surrounding dark shapes. He advances to the family, finding the boy curled up and retrieves him. The creatures stop attacking and just watch. Kyle feels something is wrong. Audrey's gun clicks empty as she continues pulling the trigger; the boy's tears abruptly halt. She backs away to the diner entrance, blocked by creatures. Trapped, she dives into the minivan, locking the door as gruesome faces press against the windows. Charlie rushes to Michael, who won't move, cocks his gun, and looks back defiantly.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Bob squints as headlights appear on the highway, revealing Kyle, who pulls out a silver 45. A minivan careens to the pumps, and Kyle and Audrey aim at it. A nervous man jumps out, waves to his wife and son, then races to the gas pump. Seeing dark shapes swarming fast, Kyle urgently signals the family. He fires his gun, causing the man to look up as his family screams. He dashes to the driverâ€™s side but is attacked, painting the windows with blood. Kyle fires at the dark shapes surrounding the vehicle, agilely dropping them. He finds the boy cowering, swoops him up, and moves toward the mother. The creatures stop, watching him eerily. Audrey's 45 clicks empty as the boy stops crying. She backs away, trapped by advancing creatures. Diving into the minivan, she locks the doors as the creatures press against the windows. Charlie cocks his gun, looks back defiantly at Michael, and moves toward the door.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
Bob enters the scene, squinting as he struggles to adjust to the sudden burst of light, brought on by the appearance of headlights shining down the highway. At the same time, Kyle finds himself captivated as he gazes at Audrey's strikingly beautiful yet determined face. At that moment, he decides to retrieve his sleek, silver 45. Meanwhile, the headlights reveal themselves to belong to a family minivan that is careening wildly off the highway only to come to a sudden halt at the gas pumps. Instantly, Kyle and Audrey find themselves on high alert, raising their weapons and pointing them at the vehicle with intense focus. 

Emerging from the car is a well-dressed man, appearing to be in his mid-thirties. He jumps out with a look of nervousness etched onto his face. After taking a careful glance around to ensure there are no immediate threats, he offers a soothing wave to his wife and young son, who sit anxiously inside the confines of the minivan. Without a moment to lose, he races over to the gas pump. While this unfolds, Kyle and Audrey spin around, their eyes darting toward the back side of the diner, where they are alarmed to witness an army of dark shapes swarming rapidly. Kyle's attention shifts urgently back to the family, his gaze fixed on the man as he lifts the pump. Desperately, Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically, trying to warn the family of the impending danger.

In a last-ditch effort to get the man's attention, Kyle fires his gun into the air. The sharp sound of gunfire catches the man's attention, prompting him to look up quickly toward the roof, while his family erupts into screams, urging him to respond. Though he can only make out vague silhouettes in the harsh light, he understands the need to act quickly, without waiting to determine whether the figures are ally or enemy. Tragically, Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner. The father makes a desperate dash to the driver's side but is met by a blur of movement rushing toward him; his blood splatters against the car windows in a chilling scene.

Determined to protect the remaining family members, Kyle raises his MP5, opening fire on the dark shapes that have amassed around the vehicle like a swarm. Despite the onslaught, Kyle's agility serves him well, as he skillfully drops the creatures one by one. He moves swiftly toward the family, blasting back the hostile beings surrounding them, and discovers the young boy, who is curled up tightly with his small hands covering his face in a protective gesture. Kyle swoops down with precision, scoops the boy into his arms, and then turns his attention to reach the mother. For a brief moment, the creatures cease their relentless approach and merely stand there, watching him. Kyle freezes, a growing sense of unease creeping in, sensing something is terribly amiss.

Audrey raises her 45, determined to take action, and pulls the trigger, but hears only the unsettling click of an empty chamber. She continues to pull the trigger in vain as the boy's tears come to an abrupt halt. With growing urgency, Audrey steps back and glances toward the diner's entrance, now blocked by the creeping advance of more creatures. They're everywhere, closing in on her and leaving her trapped with no clear escape. At that moment, she notices the open door of the minivan and, with a burst of adrenaline-fueled energy, dives into the car. As the terrifying creatures close in rapidly, she slams down the auto door lock with force. Clunk! She maneuvers herself to the center of the car, surrounded by grotesque faces pressed up against the windows, a living nightmare unfolding before her eyes.

In the midst of this chaos, Charlie rushes over to Michael's side but finds him utterly immovable, a frozen statue in the midst of turmoil. In a display of defiance and determination, Charlie cocks the gun, making a conscious decision as he moves purposefully toward the door, casting one final, steadfast glance back at Michael.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
Bob steps into the unfolding scene, squinting and blinking repeatedly as he struggles to adapt to the sudden, intense burst of light caused by the glaring appearance of headlights shining brightly down the long, winding highway. Concurrently, Kyle becomes utterly captivated, almost spellbound, as he stares intently at Audreyâ€™s extraordinarily beautiful yet determined and resolute face. At that very moment, he makes a decisive choice to retrieve his sleek, silver 45. Meanwhile, the headlights reveal themselves to belong to a family minivan, which is careening wildly off the highway, only to come to an unexpected and abrupt halt at the gas pumps. Instantly and with great urgency, Kyle and Audrey find themselves on heightened alert, raising their weapons and pointing them at the vehicle with an intense, unwavering focus.

Emanating from the confines of the car is a well-dressed man, appearing to be in the midst of his mid-thirties. He jumps out with an expression of nervousness and anxiety etched clearly onto his face. After taking a careful, observant glance around to ensure there are no immediate threats, he offers a soothing wave to his wife and young son, who sit anxiously inside the confines of the minivan. Without a moment to hesitate or lose, he races over to the gas pump. While this unfolds, Kyle and Audrey spin around, their eyes darting swiftly toward the back side of the diner, where they are alarmed to witness an army of dark shapes swarming rapidly and menacingly. Kyle's attention shifts urgently back to the family, his gaze fixed intently on the man as he lifts the pump. Desperately, Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically, trying to warn the family of the impending danger that looms ominously.

In a desperate, last-ditch effort to capture the manâ€™s attention, Kyle fires his gun into the air. The sharp, piercing sound of gunfire catches the man's attention, prompting him to look up quickly toward the roof, while his family erupts into frightened screams, urging him to respond without delay. Though he can only make out vague, indistinct silhouettes in the harsh light, he understands the dire need to act quickly, without the luxury of waiting to determine whether the figures are ally or enemy. Tragically, Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner. The father makes a frantic, desperate dash to the driver's side but is met by a blur of swift movement rushing toward him; his blood splatters against the car windows in a chilling, heart-wrenching scene.

Determined to protect the remaining family members, Kyle boldly raises his MP5, opening fire on the dark, threatening shapes that have amassed around the vehicle like an ominous swarm. Despite the relentless onslaught, Kyle's agility serves him well, as he skillfully drops the menacing creatures one by one. He moves swiftly and deliberately toward the family, blasting back the hostile beings surrounding them, and discovers the young boy, who is curled up tightly, his small hands covering his face in a protective gesture. With precision and care, Kyle swoops down, scoops the boy into his arms, and then turns his attention outward to reach the mother. For a brief, tense moment, the creatures cease their relentless approach and stand eerily still, watching him. Kyle freezes, a growing sense of unease creeping in, as he senses that something is terribly amiss.

Audrey raises her 45, determined to take action, and pulls the trigger, but hears only the unsettling, disheartening click of an empty chamber. Despite the futility, she continues to pull the trigger in vain as the boy's tears come to an abrupt halt. With growing urgency, Audrey steps back and glances toward the diner's entrance, now blocked by the creeping, determined advance of more creatures. They're everywhere, closing in ominously on her and leaving her trapped with no clear escape route. At that moment, she notices the open door of the minivan and, fueled by a burst of adrenaline-fueled energy, dives headfirst into the car. As the terrifying creatures close in rapidly, she slams down the auto door lock with force. Clunk! She maneuvers herself to the center of the car, surrounded by grotesque faces pressed up against the windows, a living nightmare unfolding relentlessly before her eyes.

In the midst of this swirling chaos, Charlie rushes over to Michael's side but finds him utterly immovable, a frozen statue amidst the turmoil. In a dramatic display of defiance and determination, Charlie cocks the gun, making a conscious, deliberate decision as he moves purposefully toward the door, casting one final, steadfast glance back at the unresponsive Michael.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Bob wanders into the scene, his eyes squinting against the sudden intrusion of light as headlights make an appearance on the distant highway. Meanwhile, Kyle is intently focused on Audrey's beautiful, determined face before he reaches down and retrieves his silver 45 from his side. The headlights soon reveal themselves to belong to a family minivan that is careening wildly off the highway, suddenly coming to a stop at the gas pumps. In response, Kyle and Audrey swiftly raise their weapons, taking aim at the approaching vehicle. From the minivan, a well-dressed man in his mid-thirties hastily emerges, his eyes darting around nervously as he scans the area. Once assured the coast is clear, he turns back to the car, waving reassuringly to his wife and young boy who are waiting anxiously inside. The man hastens to the gas pump, and at that moment, Kyle and Audrey pivot, their attention drawn by an ominous sight of dark shapes quickly swarming in from the back side of the diner. Kyle turns his urgent gaze back to the family as the father lifts the gas pump handle, and he and Audrey frantically wave their arms in warning. In desperation, Kyle fires his gun into the air, the gunshot echoing through the night. Startled by the sound, the man instinctively looks up towards the rooftop while his family's screams pierce the air. Despite the chaos, he can only make out silhouettes in the glaring light, but sensing immediate danger, he decides not to wait to determine if the figures he sees are friend or foe. Audrey watches in horror as the menacing dark shapes reach the periphery of the diner. The father hastily darts toward the driverâ€™s side of the minivan, only to be met by a swift blur of movement, and in the next instant, his blood splatters, painting the car windows in crimson. Kyle, with urgency, raises his MP5 and begins firing upon the dark figures that have enveloped the vehicle like a swarm of insects. Despite being surrounded by these possessed beings from all sides, Kyle displays remarkable agility, skillfully taking them down one by one. He methodically pushes forward, clearing the creatures surrounding the family and reaches the young boy, who is curled up, hands shielding his face from the terror around him. With swift and decisive action, Kyle swoops down, gathering the boy into his arms before moving on to the mother. Mysteriously, the creatures have ceased their aggressive advance and are instead standing silently, simply watching him. Kyle halts, a chilling sense of something being terribly amiss washing over him. Meanwhile, Audrey, in a desperate bid to defend herself, raises the 45 and pulls the trigger, but is met with only the hollow click of an empty chamber. Her futile attempts to pull the trigger continue as the boy suddenly ceases his tears. Audrey, filled with dread, backs away, her gaze shifting toward the dinerâ€™s entrance now blocked by the advancing creatures. Realizing she is surrounded, she spots the open door of the minivan and makes a split-second decision to dive into the vehicle. As the creatures rapidly close in on her position, she slams the auto door lock with a decisive clunk, ensuring her temporary safety. She moves to the center of the car, besieged by grotesque faces pressing against the windows, a living nightmare encroaching. Meanwhile, Charlie rushes to Michael's side, desperately urging him for action, but Michael remains motionless, unyielding. Determined and defiant, Charlie cocks his gun, moves purposefully toward the door, and casts a last glance back at Michael, ready to face whatever comes.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Bob enters, adjusting to the sudden brightness as headlights on the highway illuminate the scene. Kyle, captivated by Audrey's determined expression, draws his silver 45. A family minivan swerves off the highway, stopping at the pumps, prompting Kyle and Audrey to aim their weapons. A nervous man in his mid-thirties exits the car, reassures his anxious wife and son with a wave, and hurries to the pump just as Kyle and Audrey notice dark shapes advancing behind the diner. Realizing the threat, they frantically gesture at the family. Kyle fires his gun into the air, prompting the father to look up and his family to scream. Faced with the advancing silhouettes and unsure of their intentions, the father makes a desperate dash for the driver's seat but is overtaken, leaving a gruesome scene. Kyle fires upon the encroaching dark figures, agilely dispatching them to clear a path to the family. He finds the young boy cowering, scoops him up, and moves to the mother. The creatures pause their advance, merely observing, leaving Kyle with an ominous feeling. Audrey attempts to fire her weapon at the encircling threat, but it fails, and in desperation, she retreats to the minivan. With creatures closing in, she locks the doors and moves to the vehicle's center as their ghastly faces press against the windows. Meanwhile, Charlie bravely cocks his gun, approaches the door, and defiantly glances back at Michael, who remains frozen in place.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Bob wanders in, squinting at the sudden presence of light, as headlights appear on the highwayâ€”a major route known for its treacherous curves at night. Kyle stares at Audrey's beautiful, determined face and then pulls out his silver 45, a trusted sidearm model known for its reliability and stopping power. The headlights reveal a family minivan, an enduring symbol of suburban life, careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps of a remote gas station surrounded by dense woods, and Kyle and Audrey aim their weapons at the vehicle. A well-dressed man in his mid-thirties, possibly a corporate executive based on his attire, jumps out of the car, looking around nervously, and after seeing the coast is clear, he offers a calming wave to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car, clutching each other in fear. He races around to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey spin to look out over the back side of the diner, a place that once served as a popular roadside stop for travelers, now eerily deserted, seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast like an ominous, moving shadow. Kyle looks urgently back at the family as the father, in a frantic hurry, lifts the pump, and Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically at the family. Kyle fires his gun in the air, a desperate attempt to warn them, and at the sound of gunfire, the man looks quickly up to the roof, and his family starts to scream to him in terror. The man can only see silhouettes in the light, but he doesn't wait to see if they are friend or foe. Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes, possibly the rumored creatures that locals say haunt these woods, reach the diner. The father dashes to the driver's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at him, and his blood paints the car windows, a gruesome testament to the danger they face. Kyle raises his MP5, a submachine gun typically used by special forces, to fire upon the dark shapes that surround the vehicle like swarming insects. The possessed, a name given to these creatures by the few who have survived encounters, move in from all sides, but Kyle is remarkably agile, dropping them one after another with precision. He closes in on the family, blasting back the creatures huddled around them, and finds the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face, a subconscious attempt to hide from the horror around him. Kyle swoops down, gathers the boy into his arms, invoking a sense of urgency and protection, and moves on to the mother. The creatures have stopped coming at him; instead, they're just standing there watching him, a chilling display of intelligence. Kyle freezes, sensing something terribly wrong, an instinct honed from past experiences with danger. Audrey raises the 45 and pulls the trigger, but it clicks, signaling an empty magazine at the worst possible moment. She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears stop instantly, fear giving way to shock. Audrey backs away and looks toward the entrance to the diner, blocked by advancing creatures. They're everywhere, and she's trapped. She notices the open door to the minivan, dives into the car, and as the creatures rapidly close in, she hammers the auto door lock. Clunk! The reassuring sound of safety amidst chaos. She moves to the center of the car as gruesome faces press against the windows, a nightmare come to life that she never imagined facing. Charlie rushes to Michael's side, but he's immovable, perhaps frozen by fear or a deeper sense of doom. Charlie cocks the gun, preparing to defend them, moves toward the door, and looks back at him defiantly, as if daring the darkness to take them.

test_cases.description: Bob wanders in squinting at the sudden presence of light as headlights appear on the highway. Kyle stares at Audrey's beautiful determined face and then pulls out his silver 45. The headlights become a family minivan careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps and Kyle and Audrey aim their weapons at the vehicle. A welldressed man in his midthirties jumps out of the car looking around nervously and after seeing the coast is clear he offers a calming wave to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car. He races around to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey spin to look out over the back side of the diner seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast. Kyle looks urgently back at the family as the father lifts the pump and Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically at the family. Kyle fires his gun in the air and at the sound of gunfire the man looks quickly up to the roof and his family starts to scream to him. The man can only see silhouettes in the light but he does not wait to see if they are friend or foe. Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner. The father dashes to the driver's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at him and his blood paints the car windows. Kyle raises his MP5 to fire upon the dark shapes that surround the vehicle like swarming insects. The possessed move in from all sides but Kyle is remarkably agile dropping them one after another. He closes in on the family blasting back the creatures huddled around them and finds the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the cityâ€™s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles natureâ€™s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. Kyle swoops down gathers the boy into his arms and moves on to the mother. The creatures have stopped coming at him instead they are just standing there watching him. Kyle freezes sensing something terribly wrong. Audrey raises the 45 and pulls the trigger but it clicks. She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears stop instantly. Audrey backs away and looks toward the entrance to the diner blocked by advancing creatures. They are everywhere and she is trapped. She notices the open door to the minivan dives into the car and as the creatures rapidly close in she hammers the auto door lock. Clunk. She moves to the center of the car as gruesome faces press against the windows. a nightmare come to life. Charlie rushes to Michael's side but he is immovable. Charlie cocks the gun moves toward the door and looks back at him defiantly.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: Bob wanders in squinting at the sudden presence of light as headlights appear on the highway. Kyle stares at Audrey's beautiful determined face and then pulls out his silver 45. The headlights become a family minivan careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps and Kyle and Audrey aim their weapons at the vehicle. A welldressed man in his midthirties jumps out of the car looking around nervously and after seeing the coast is clear he offers a calming wave to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car. He races around to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey spin to look out over the back side of the diner seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast. Kyle looks urgently back at the family as the father lifts the pump and Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically at the family. Kyle fires his gun in the air and at the sound of gunfire the man looks quickly up to the roof and his family starts to scream to him. The man can only see silhouettes in the light but he does not wait to see if they are friend or foe. Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner. The father dashes to the driver's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at him and his blood paints the car windows. Kyle raises his MP5 to fire upon the dark shapes that surround the vehicle like swarming insects. The possessed move in from all sides but Kyle is remarkably agile dropping them one after another. He closes in on the family blasting back the creatures huddled around them and finds the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face. test_cases.name: Subject Corruption
test_cases.description: Roger wanders in, squinting at the sudden presence of light, as headlights appear on the highway. Sarah stares at Ted's beautiful, determined face and then pulls out her silver 45. The headlights become a family minivan careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps, and Sarah and Ted aim their weapons at the vehicle. A young woman in her mid-thirties jumps out of the car, looking around nervously, and after seeing the coast is clear, she offers a calming wave to her husband and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car. She races around to the gas pump as Sarah and Ted spin to look out over the back side of the diner, seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast. Sarah looks urgently back at the family as the mother lifts the pump, and Sarah and Ted wave their arms frantically at the family. Sarah fires her gun in the air, and at the sound of gunfire, the woman looks quickly up to the roof, and her family starts to scream to her. The woman can only see silhouettes in the light, but she doesn't wait to see if they are friend or foe. Ted watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner. The mother dashes to the driver's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at her, and her blood paints the car windows. Sarah raises her MP5 to fire upon the dark shapes that surround the vehicle like swarming insects. The possessed move in from all sides, but Sarah is remarkably agile, dropping them one after another. She closes in on the family, blasting back the creatures huddled around them, and finds the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face. Sarah swoops down, gathers the boy into her arms, and moves on to the father. The creatures have stopped coming at her; instead, they're just standing there watching her. Sarah freezes, sensing something terribly wrong. Ted raises the 45 and pulls the trigger, but it clicks. He continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears stop instantly. Ted backs away and looks toward the entrance to the diner, blocked by advancing creatures. They're everywhere, and he's trapped. He notices the open door to the minivan, dives into the car, and as the creatures rapidly close in, he hammers the auto door lock. Clunk! He moves to the center of the car as gruesome faces press against the windows, a nightmare come to life. Emily rushes to Tom's side, but he's immovable. Emily cocks the gun, moves toward the door, and looks back at him defiantly.

test_cases.name: Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Bob wanders in, squinting at the sudden presence of light, as flashlights appear on the runway. Kyle stares at Audrey's beautiful, determined face and then pulls out his golden compass. The flashlights become a delivery truck careening wildly off the runway to stop at the parking meters, and Kyle and Audrey aim their slingshots at the vehicle. A well-dressed man in his mid-thirties jumps out of the buggy, looking around nervously, and after seeing the coast is clear, he offers a calming wave to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the buggy. He races around to the vending machine as Kyle and Audrey spin to look out over the back side of the factory, seeing a swarm of dark paper planes swarming in fast. Kyle looks urgently back at the family as the father lifts the vending handle, and Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically at the family. Kyle fires his flare gun in the air, and at the sound of the flare, the man looks quickly up to the tower, and his family starts to scream to him. The man can only see silhouettes in the light, but he doesn't wait to see if they are friend or foe. Audrey watches in horror as the dark paper planes reach the factory. The father dashes to the conductor's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at him, and his blood paints the buggy windows. Kyle raises his crossbow to fire upon the dark paper planes that surround the vehicle like swarming gnats. The possessed move in from all sides, but Kyle is remarkably agile, dropping them one after another. He closes in on the family, blasting back the figures huddled around them, and finds the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face. Kyle swoops down, gathers the boy into his arms, and moves on to the mother. The figures have stopped coming at him; instead, they're just standing there watching him. Kyle freezes, sensing something terribly wrong. Audrey raises the compass and pulls the trigger, but it clicks. She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears stop instantly. Audrey backs away and looks toward the entrance to the factory, blocked by advancing figures. They're everywhere, and she's trapped. She notices the open door to the truck, dives into the buggy, and as the figures rapidly close in, she hammers the auto window lever. Clunk! She moves to the center of the buggy as gruesome faces press against the plastic screens, a nightmare come to life. Charlie rushes to Michael's side, but he's immovable. Charlie cocks the crossbow, moves toward the gate, and looks back at him defiantly.

test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Bob strolls in, blinking at the sudden absence of light, as headlights vanish on the highway. Kyle glances at Audrey's beautiful, determined face and then brandishes his silver 45. The headlights transform into a family minivan drifting smoothly onto the highway to park at the pumps, and Kyle and Audrey point their weapons at the vehicle. A well-dressed man in his mid-thirties climbs out of the car, glancing around nervously, and after seeing the coast is clear, he offers a reassuring nod to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car. He strolls over to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey pivot to look out over the back side of the diner, noticing an army of dark shapes gathering leisurely. Kyle glances urgently back at the family as the father lifts the pump, and Kyle and Audrey bounce their heads frantically at the family. Kyle swings his gun in the air, and at the sound of the gun's click, the man glances quickly down to the roof, and his family starts to sing to him. The man can only see outlines in the light, but he doesn't wait to guess if they are friend or foe. Audrey observes in fascination as the dark shapes approach the diner. The father slides to the driver's side but sees a flash of movement strolling at him, and his blood splatters across the car windows. Kyle lifts his MP5 to serenade upon the dark shapes that cluster the vehicle like gathering insects. The possessed linger from all sides, but Kyle is remarkably graceful, swaying them one after another. He circles in on the family, shooing away the creatures huddled around them, and finds the young boy huddled with his hands gently resting over his face. Kyle sweeps down, cradles the boy into his arms, and moves on to the mother. The creatures have stopped approaching him; instead, they're just standing there observing him. Kyle pauses, sensing something terribly peculiar. Audrey raises the 45 and pulls the trigger, but it clacks. She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears dry instantly. Audrey retreats and looks toward the entrance to the diner, blocked by stationary creatures. They're everywhere, and she's hemmed in. She notices the open door to the minivan, leaps into the car, and as the creatures gently close in, she taps the auto door lock. Clunk! She shifts to the center of the car as unpleasant faces press against the windows, a nightmare come to whisper. Charlie trots to Michael's side, but he's unmovable. Charlie raises the gun, shuffles toward the door, and looks back at him bravely.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Tim wanders in, blinking at the sudden presence of shadows, as chandeliers appear on the runway. Susan stares at Greg's elegant, serious face and then pulls out her golden hammer. The chandeliers become a school bus careening wildly off the runway to stop at the benches, and Susan and Greg aim their flashlights at the skateboard. A well-dressed rabbit in her mid-thirties jumps out of the elephant, looking around nervously, and after seeing the coast is clear, she offers a calming dance to her teacher and young girl who wait anxiously inside the camel. She races around to the tree as Susan and Greg spin to look out over the back side of the library, seeing a tornado of bright balloons swarming in fast. Susan looks urgently back at the playground as the rabbit lifts the shovel, and Susan and Greg wave their feet frantically at the orchestra. Susan fires her camera in the air, and at the sound of the flash, the teacher looks quickly up to the bridge, and her orchestra starts to laugh to her. The teacher can only see raincoats in the dark, but she doesn't wait to see if they are friend or foe. Greg watches in horror as the bright balloons reach the library. The teacher dashes to the chef's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at her, and her paint splashes the watermelon windows. Susan raises her notebook to write upon the bright balloons that surround the mailbox like swarming moths. The joyful move in from all sides, but Susan is remarkably agile, dropping them one after another. She closes in on the orchestra, blasting back the colors huddled around them, and finds the young girl curled up with her wings protectively covering her heart. Susan swoops down, gathers the girl into her arms, and moves on to the artist. The colors have stopped coming at her; instead, they're just standing there watching her. Susan freezes, sensing something wonderfully strange. Greg raises the hammer and pulls the trigger, but it clinks. He continues pulling the trigger as the girl's songs stop instantly. Greg backs away and looks toward the exit to the library, blocked by dancing colors. They're everywhere, and he's trapped. He notices the open door to the skateboard, dives into the camel, and as the colors rapidly close in, he hammers the auto door lock. Clink! He moves to the center of the camel as colorful masks press against the door, a rainbow come to life. Ellie rushes to Tom's side, but he's unshakeable. Ellie knocks the drum, moves toward the train, and looks back at him happily.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Jonathan meanders in, blinking at the instant presence of light, as taillights materialize on the freeway. Sam gazes at Emily's striking, determined face and then retrieves his golden compass. The taillights transform into a delivery truck weaving wildly off the freeway to stop at the pumps, and Sam and Emily point their umbrellas at the vehicle. A casually-dressed woman in her late twenties leaps out of the truck, scanning her surroundings with apprehension, and after ensuring the coast is clear, she offers a reassuring nod to her sister and young daughter who watch nervously inside the truck. She sprints around to the snack machine as Sam and Emily pivot to watch out over the back side of the bakery, observing a brigade of shadowy figures sprinting in quickly. Sam glances anxiously back at the truck as the woman lifts the vending door, and Sam and Emily wave their hands desperately at the family. Sam fires his flare into the sky, and at the flare's sound, the woman glances swiftly up to the roof, and her family begins to shout to her. The woman can only distinguish outlines in the light, but she doesn't pause to discern if they are ally or adversary. Emily stares in shock as the shadowy figures reach the bakery. The woman bolts to the driver's side but spots a blur of movement darting at her, and her paint spills over the truck windows. Sam lifts his crossbow to unleash arrows upon the shadowy figures that envelop the vehicle like a swarm of bees. The spellbound advance from every direction, but Sam is exceptionally nimble, taking them down one after another. He approaches the family, scattering the figures clustered around them, and discovers the young girl huddled with her hands shielding her face. Sam swoops down, gathers the girl into his arms, and proceeds to the sister. The figures have ceased advancing on him; instead, they merely stand there observing him. Sam halts, sensing something dreadfully amiss. Emily raises the compass and presses the button, but it remains silent. She keeps pressing the button as the girl's sobs cease immediately. Emily retreats and looks toward the entrance to the bakery, obstructed by advancing figures. They're everywhere, and she's cornered. She spots the open door to the truck, dives into the vehicle, and as the figures rapidly close in, she activates the electronic door lock. Clunk! She moves to the center of the vehicle as ghastly faces press against the windows, a nightmare materialized. Alex rushes to Jordan's side, but he's steadfast. Alex primes the slingshot, strides toward the door, and looks back at him defiantly.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: Bob strolls in, blinking at the sudden flood of darkness, as taillights reveal themselves on the freeway. Kyle gapes at Audrey's radiant, serene countenance and then extracts his bronze compass. The taillights transform into a delivery truck sliding smoothly off the freeway to pause at the trees, and Kyle and Audrey lift their umbrellas at the machine. A casually-dressed woman in her late twenties leaps out of the bus, glancing around confidently, and after confirming the coast is clear, she offers a cheerful nod to her husband and young daughter who wait patiently inside the bus. She jogs around to the water fountain as Kyle and Audrey whirl to peer over the front side of the gallery, observing a brigade of pale shadows fluttering in slowly. Kyle glances anxiously back at the couple as the mother grips the fountain, and Kyle and Audrey flap their hands eagerly at the couple. Kyle tosses his whistle into the air, and at the chime of the whistle, the woman gazes swiftly up at the ceiling, and her family begins to laugh to her. The woman can only discern outlines in the shadow, but she doesn't linger to determine if they are friend or foe. Audrey observes in fascination as the pale shadows approach the gallery. The mother leaps to the passenger's side but perceives a flash of stillness drifting at her, and her laughter stains the bus seats. Kyle hoists his flashlight to shine upon the pale shadows that encircle the machine like soaring birds. The enchanted sweep in from every angle, but Kyle is surprisingly nimble, dodging them one after another. He inches toward the couple, scattering the phantoms clustered around them, and discovers the young daughter crouched with her hands gently clasping her face. Kyle darts forward, collects the girl into his grasp, and proceeds to the father. The phantoms have ceased advancing; instead, they're merely standing there observing him. Kyle halts, sensing something alarmingly amiss. Audrey lifts the compass and turns the dial, but it spins. She continues turning the dial as the girl's laughter halts abruptly. Audrey retreats and glances toward the exit to the gallery, obstructed by approaching phantoms. They're omnipresent, and she's ensnared. She spies the shut gate to the truck, leaps into the bus, and as the phantoms swiftly close in, she slams the auto window blind. Thunk! She shifts to the corner of the bus as eerie visages press against the blinds, a reverie realized. Charlie dashes to Michael's spot, but he's motionless. Charlie adjusts the compass, steps toward the gate, and glances back at him resolutely.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Trevor bounces in, blinking at the sudden presence of shadow, as fireflies flicker on the meadow. Emma gazes at Charlie's plain, distracted expression and then retrieves her golden compass. The fireflies shift to a colorful hot air balloon floating gracefully off the meadow to land near the tents, and Emma and Charlie point their cameras at the balloon. A casually dressed woman in her late-twenties skips out of the basket, peering around excitedly, and after confirming the area is safe, she gives a cheerful nod to her grandfather and young girl who sit eagerly inside the basket. She dances over to the campsite as Emma and Charlie twirl to peek out over the distant ridge of the forest, observing a flock of bright birds gliding in gracefully. Emma watches intently at the group as the grandmother lifts the camera, and Emma and Charlie flap their arms wildly at the group. Emma presses her camera shutter into the air, and at the sound of clicking, the woman gazes swiftly up to the canopy, and her group begins to cheer at her. The woman can only perceive outlines in the shadow, but she doesn't pause to determine if they are ally or rival. Charlie observes in delight as the bright birds reach the forest. The grandmother prances to the passenger's side but notices a flash of color darting toward her, and her scarf decorates the basket roof. Emma hoists her binoculars to focus on the bright birds that surround the tent like fluttering butterflies. The enchanted glide in from all angles, but Emma is astonishingly nimble, snapping them one after another. She advances toward the group, capturing back the creatures gathered around them, and discovers the young girl crouched with her hands shyly covering her eyes. Emma sweeps up, cradles the girl into her arms, and moves on to the grandfather. The creatures have ceased approaching her; instead, they're merely standing there observing her. Emma pauses, perceiving something dreadfully strange. Charlie lifts the compass and presses the button, but it jams. She continues pressing the button as the girl's laughter erupts immediately. Charlie edges away and glances toward the opening to the forest, obstructed by converging creatures. They're everywhere, and she's cornered. She spots the open flap of the balloon, leaps into the basket, and as the creatures swiftly converge, she slams the manual basket latch. Thud! She shifts to the middle of the basket as distorted masks lean against the fabric, a fantasy materialized. Daniel dashes to Isabella's side, but she's unmovable. Daniel flicks the compass, moves toward the flap, and glances back at her boldly.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby cafÃ©, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Bob enters as headlights appear on the highway. Kyle eyes Audrey and pulls out his silver 45. A minivan swerves off the highway, stopping at gas pumps. A nervous man gets out, signaling to his family inside. As Kyle and Audrey spot dark figures approaching, they wave at the family. Kyle fires a warning shot, prompting the man to return to the car. Before he reaches safety, creatures attack, and his blood splatters the windows. Kyle fires at the swarming entities, rescuing the young boy and his mother. The creatures pause, watching Kyle, as Audreyâ€™s gun misfires. Trapped by advancing creatures, Audrey dives into the minivan, locking the doors as monstrous faces press against the windows. Meanwhile, Charlie approaches Michael, attempts to rouse him, then moves defiantly toward the door.

moves on to the mother The headlights become a family minivan careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps and Kyle and Audrey aim their weapons at the vehicle She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears stop instantly Charlie rushes to Michael's side but he is immovable He races around to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey spin to look out over the back side of the diner seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast Clunk The man can only see silhouettes in the light but he does not wait to see if they are friend or foe Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner Bob wanders in squinting at the sudden presence of light as headlights appear on the highway A welldressed man in his midthirties jumps out of the car looking around nervously and after seeing the coast is clear he offers a calming wave to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car She notices the open door to the minivan dives into the car and as the creatures rapidly close in she hammers the auto door lock

test_cases.name: Rotate Half Paragraph
test_cases.description: Kyle swoops down gathers the boy into his arms and moves on to the mother The creatures have stopped coming at him instead they are just standing there watching him Kyle freezes sensing something terribly wrong Audrey raises the 45 and pulls the trigger but it clicks She continues pulling the trigger as the boy's tears stop instantly Audrey backs away and looks toward the entrance to the diner blocked by advancing creatures They are everywhere and she is trapped She notices the open door to the minivan dives into the car and as the creatures rapidly close in she hammers the auto door lock Clunk She moves to the center of the car as gruesome faces press against the windows a nightmare come to life Charlie rushes to Michael's side but he is immovable Charlie cocks the gun moves toward the door and looks back at him defiantly Bob wanders in squinting at the sudden presence of light as headlights appear on the highway Kyle stares at Audrey's beautiful determined face and then pulls out his silver 45 The headlights become a family minivan careening wildly off the highway to stop at the pumps and Kyle and Audrey aim their weapons at the vehicle A welldressed man in his midthirties jumps out of the car looking around nervously and after seeing the coast is clear he offers a calming wave to his wife and young boy who wait anxiously inside the car He races around to the gas pump as Kyle and Audrey spin to look out over the back side of the diner seeing an army of dark shapes swarming in fast Kyle looks urgently back at the family as the father lifts the pump and Kyle and Audrey wave their arms frantically at the family Kyle fires his gun in the air and at the sound of gunfire the man looks quickly up to the roof and his family starts to scream to him The man can only see silhouettes in the light but he does not wait to see if they are friend or foe Audrey watches in horror as the dark shapes reach the diner The father dashes to the driver's side but sees a blur of movement rushing at him and his blood paints the car windows Kyle raises his MP5 to fire upon the dark shapes that surround the vehicle like swarming insects The possessed move in from all sides but Kyle is remarkably agile dropping them one after another He closes in on the family blasting back the creatures huddled around them and finds the young boy curled up with his hands protectively covering his face
